name: incontestably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to question because of being obviously true: Dance is incontestably an elegant art form. He was incontestably one of the greatest bandleaders in the history of rhythm and blues. See
incontestable
More examplesFewer examplesAs she incontestably points out, renewing your car’s brake linings is cheaper than replacing a burned-out clutch.The Chrysler Building is an incontestably beautiful New York skyscraper.Some say he is incontestably the greatest American novelist.
